channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Looking back at Sarasota, Manatee's all-time state baseball championship teams
item.description: Since the Florida High School Athletic Association started holding baseball state championships in 1922, Sarasota/Manatee counties have racked up 25 titles, the first dating back to 1925.

item.title: MLB Draft: Venice High grad Marek Houston projected to be first rounder
item.description: After his senior season on the Venice High baseball team, Marek Houston received an invitation to attend the Major League Baseball Draft Combine in San Diego.

item.title: We hand-picked last-chance Prime Day deals to shop before midnight
item.description: What day is it? Is it still July? After three product-packed days, we've reached the final countdown:Amazon Prime Day 2025endstonight, July 11. TheUSA TODAY Shopping teamhas been tracking all the most popular price cuts, the deepest discounts and yes, some of the most unexpected finds from the big sale.

item.title: Amazon has 50% off the Waterpik Aquarius Water Flosser for Prime Day
item.description: If you're like me and have discovered the significant improvement a water flosser can bring to your oral health routine, then you'll be glad to learn that duringAmazon's Prime Day shopping event(ends tonight,Friday, July 11), they are offering the best-sellingWaterpik Aquarius Water Flosserfor 50% off at less than $50.

item.title: Want to vacuum your mattress? Get 46% off this last-chance Prime deal
item.description: The clock will soon hit midnight onPrime Dayand if we have anything to do with it, you'll fall asleep dreaming of all the savings you just earned!

item.title: As prosecutions rise, fearful immigrants pick fast-track…
item.description: In a cold courtroom in downtown Tallahassee, Isabela Hurtado sat in a wooden pew. It had been over a month since she last saw her father.

item.title: Building bans, rooster limits run afoul of new…
item.description: TALLAHASSEE – One county has postponed plans to banroosters in some neighborhoods; others worry about pausingnew constructionor repairingdamaged wetlands.

item.title: Celebrate Slurpee Day with free drink, tongue tattoo…
item.description: There's no denying it's been hot in Florida, with heat index numbers getting as high as 107.

item.title: Report: Florida has tripled daily ICE arrests since…
item.description: As PresidentDonald Trumpcontinues his mission to carry out the biggestmass deportation in history, multiple reports show how much daily immigration enforcement arrests have ballooned nationwide, andFlorida is no exception.

item.title: Steube plays ugly politics with One Big Beautiful Bill…
item.description: "Borrow and Spend" CongressmanGreg Steubeof Sarasota says theOne Big Beautiful Bill– which was recentlysigned into law– will cut taxes for Americans.

item.title: State officials issue health advisory warning for North Lido Beach
item.description: Health officials issued an advisory against getting in the water off North Lido Beach because ofhigh bacteria levels that can cause sickness.

item.title: New foundation led by CAN Community Health aims to address HIV care
item.description: New foundation led by CAN Community Health aims to address HIV care

item.title: Avelo extends Florida flight schedule through February. What to know
item.description: Avelo Airlines, which has come under fire for agreeing to transport detained immigrants, announced July 9 it is extending its East Coast flight schedule to mid-February 2026. Avelo has routes to 11 Florida airports.

item.title: 10 essential new Sarasota restaurants that live up to the hype
item.description: 10 essential new Sarasota restaurants that live up to the hype

item.title: Top 5 concerts this week in Sarasota, Bradenton, Englewood, Anna Maria Island, Palmetto
item.description: Like many weeksin Julyandthe Sarasota area's off-season, this week's concert picks largely consist of talented musicians who call Florida home. However, we do kick things off with a reggae musician from California, who visits the area while on tour with a group from Maryland.
